mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HANA_WALLET(WALLET_SEQ, USER_SEQ as userSeq, AC_NO as acNo, WALLET_PW as walletPw) VALUES (HANA_WALLET_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userSeq}, #{acNo}, #{walletPw})
mapper.select: SELECT wallet_seq as walletSeq, user_seq as userSeq, ac_no as acNo, wallet_pw as walletPw, balance, deposit, CURRENCY_CODE as currencyCode, currency, prime_rate as primeRate FROM HANA_WALLET where ac_no = #{acNo}

SELECT wallet_seq as walletSeq, user_seq as userSeq, ac_no as acNo, wallet_pw as walletPw, balance, CURRENCY_CODE as currencyCode, currency, prime_rate as primeRate FROM HANA_WALLET where user_seq = #{userSeq} and currency_code = #{currencyCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HANA_WALLET_HIST(WALLET_TRANS_NO, WALLET_SEQ as walletSeq, balance, transaction_amount as transactionAmount, currency_code as currencyCode, currency, transaction_type as transactionType, withdraw_cur as withdrawCur, withdraw_name as withdrawName) VALUES (HANA_WALLET_HIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{walletSeq}, #{balance}, #{transactionAmount}, #{currencyCode}, #{currency}, #{transactionType}, #{withdrawCur}, #{withdrawName})

INSERT INTO HANA_WALLET_HIST(WALLET_TRANS_NO, WALLET_SEQ, balance, transaction_amount, currency_code, currency, transaction_type, deposit_cur, deposit_name) VALUES (HANA_WALLET_HIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{walletSeq}, #{balance}, #{transactionAmount}, #{currencyCode}, #{currency}, #{transactionType}, #{depositCur}, #{depositName})
mapper.select: SELECT balance FROM HANA_WALLET where wallet_seq = #{walletSeq}
